briefTitle: BEKINDA (Ondansetron 24 mg Bimodal Release Tablets) for Vomiting Due to Presumed Acute Gastroenteritis or Gastritis
officialTitle: Randomized, Placebo-Controlled, Phase 3 Trial of BEKINDA (Ondansetron 24 mg Bimodal Release Tablets) for Vomiting Due to Presumed Acute Gastroenteritis or Gastritis (The GUARD Study)
summary:
Randomized, Placebo-Controlled, Phase 3 Trial of RHB-102 (BEKINDA) (Ondansetron 24 mg Bimodal Release Tablets) for Acute Gastroenteritis.

The study will evaluate the safety and efficacy of RHB-102 (BEKINDA) in treating Acute Gastroenteritis, by comparing it to placebo.

primaryOutcome.measure: Treatment Success From 30 Minutes Through 24 Hours After First Dose of Study Medication - ITT Population
